queries.description: A for-loop that loops through all elements of the container and does not use its loop-counter shall not be used.

A6-5-1.title: A for-loop that loops through all elements of the container and does not use its loop-counter shall not be used.

queries.description: A for loop shall contain a single loop-counter.

A6-5-2.title: A for loop shall contain a single loop-counter which shall not have floating-point type.

queries.description: Do statements can be more prone to bugs than for or while loops, because the condition is not checked before the loop is executed.
queries.name: Do statements should not be used

A6-5-3.title: Do statements should not be used.

queries.description: If loop-counter is not modified by -- or ++, then, within condition, the loop-counter shall only be used as an operand to <=, <, > or >=.
queries.name: Loop-counter incremented/decremented by more than one shall be an operand to <=, <, >, or >=

M6-5-2.title: If loop-counter is not modified by or ++, then, within condition, the loop-counter shall only be used as an operand to <=, <, > or >=.

queries.description: The loop-counter shall not be modified within condition.
queries.name: Loop-counter modified within condition

queries.description: The loop-counter shall not be modified within a statement.
queries.name: Loop-counter modified within condition

M6-5-3.title: The loop-counter shall not be modified within condition or statement.

queries.description: The loop-counter should be modified by one of: --, ++, -=n, or +=n; where n remains constant for the duration of the loop.
queries.name: Loop-counter modified by one of --, ++, = n, or + = n, where n remains constant

M6-5-4.title: The loop-counter should be modified by one of: --, ++, -=n, or +=n, where n remains constant for the duration of the loop.

queries.description: A loop-control-variable other than the loop-counter shall not be modified within a condition.
queries.name: Loop-control-variable modified within a condition

queries.description: A loop-control-variable other than the loop-counter shall not be modified within an expression.
queries.name: Loop-control-variable modified within a expression

M6-5-5.title: A loop-control-variable other than the loop-counter shall not be modified within a condition or an expression.

queries.description: A loop-control-variable other than the loop-counter which is modified in a statement shall have type bool.
queries.name: Loop-control-variable modified in a statement shall have type bool

M6-5-6.title: A loop-control-variable other than the loop-counter which is modified in a statement shall have type bool.
